Constructor Detail

Map

public Map(int width,
           int height)
Creates a new 'Map' with a given size.

Parameters:
width - The amount of 'Tiles' in x - direction.
height - The amount of 'Tiles' in y - direction.
Method Detail

getTile

public Tile getTile(int x,
                    int y)
Gives back the 'Tile' at position (x, y) from the 'Map'. If the position (x, y) does not exist, 'null' will be returned.

Parameters:
x - The x - position of the 'Tile' in the 'Map'.
y - The y - position of the 'Tile' in the 'Map'.
Returns:
The 'Tile' at position (x, y).

setTile

public void setTile(Tile tile,
                    int x,
                    int y)
Sets the 'Tile' at position (x, y) in the 'Map'. If the position (x, y) does not exist, nothing will be set.

Parameters:
tile - The 'Tile' to set at (x, y).
x - The x - position of the 'Tile' in the 'Map'.
y - The y - position of the 'Tile' in the 'Map'.

render

public void render()
Renders the whole 'Map' to the screen.

render

public void render(int x,
                   int y,
                   int width,
                   int height)
Renders a certain area of the 'Map' from (x, y) to (x + width, y + height) to the screen.

Parameters:
x - The start of the area to render in x - direction.
y - The start of the area to render in y - direction.
width - The width of the area to render.
height - The height of the area to render.

render

public void render(java.awt.Rectangle rec)
Renders the area of the 'Map' specified by the 'Rectangle' rec.

Parameters:
rec - The 'Rectangle' that specifies the area to render.

public void update(int delta)
